dcterms:description: FoCus is a dataset where a human and a machine take turns having a conversation about a specific landmark, consisting of 14,452 conversations with 173,424 utterances.
dcterms:title: FoCus

dcterms:description: Wizard of Wikipedia (WoW) is a conversational dataset based on Wikipedia articles on various topics, consisting of 22,311 conversations with a total of 201,999 utterances.
dcterms:title: Wizard of Wikipedia (WoW)

dcterms:creator: Kangyan Zhou
Shrimai Prabhumoye
Alan W Black
dcterms:description: CMUDoG is a knowledge grounded conversation dataset with two speakers conversing based on movie Wikipedia articles, consisting of a total of 4,112 conversations.
dcterms:title: CMUDoG
